# Educational Videos

## [Crash Course Statistics](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8dPuuaLjXtNM_Y-bUAhblSAdWRnmBUcr)

- Parts 1 - 13 outline the concepts of statistical thinking, and give a solid grounding for quantitative thinking.
- Parts 14 - 36 cover examples of statistical tests, and the mechanisms by which we make inferences.
- Parts 37 - 45 cover more advanced topics like machine learning, and *big data*

# [Stat Quest](https://www.youtube.com/@statquest)

- This channel covers general introductions to multiple statistical concepts
- The [Statistics Fundamentals](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLblh5JKOoLUK0FLuzwntyYI10UQFUhsY9) playlist gives a solid grounding.
